d works fine when tested directly
Issue appears to be nginx proxy configuration

What ChatGPT Can Do Right Now
ChatGPT can already:

Search live MariaDB data using the search endpoint
Access encrypted GitHub memory using the API endpoints with salt
Browse static memory files with salt authentication

What's Missing
ChatGPT cannot retrieve full content of specific memory entries by ID from the live MariaDB database.
Impact

75% functional - ChatGPT has substantial memory access
Search works - Can find relevant memory items
Cannot get full content - Missing the ability to read complete entries

Technical Root Cause
The /mem/get endpoint routing between nginx proxy and Flask backend has a configuration mismatch causing 404/401 errors.
For ChatGPT Testing
Start with working endpoints:

https://api.nsgia.com/api/ (will prompt for salt)
https://api.nsgia.com/mem/search?keyword=memory&limit=3&key=public-read-2025

The memory system is mostly functional and provides significant value even with this one routing issue.RetryRouting Fix Memo for Claude: Make ChatGPT Read Full Entries
Audience: Claude. Objective: fix the last broken path so ChatGPT can retrieve single conversations from MariaDB. Keep steps literal. Do not improvise.
